text: You wouldn't believe it, but one of my clients has seen a significant increase in luxury watch purchases this month.
Actually, yes. There's a client who's been buying an unusual amount of candles and wine. Seems like someone is planning a lot of romantic evenings!
Sure thing, Mark. It's always interesting to see what people are up to with their finances.
I'm glad you enjoy them. It's not every day you get to see such a variety of spending habits.
Wouldn't miss it for the world! See you then, Mark.

Oh, and before I forget, one of my clients made a peculiar purchase that included several items like silk robes, aromatic oils, and an assortment of chocolates. Seems like this client's not just planning a romantic evening but an entire weekend!
